description: Teresa is a telepathic young woman living on the planet Telezart in a hovering palace. She is said to have mastered anti-matter technology, and her prayers can generate a powerful force of energy. She watched her world, an interstellar hub, degenerate into an all-out war, and in a tragic turn of events she inadvertly uses her powers to destroy the very planet she held so dear. When the Comet Empire threatens the Galaxy, she sends out a message to Earth, attempting to warn them of the danger.
name: Teresa
